about_the_game:
ARROW is a Relaxing and fun puzzle game with an enigmatic atmosphere, which will immerse you in a unique experience and make you relax while activating your brain creating strategies that will increase your IQ.

How to Play
How to play? Easy! Move the arrow tiles and collect the dots, but only tiles with arrow directions that match the key pressed will move. You will also find challenges such as teleporters and rotators that will put you thinking and make this game a real challenge for your brain.

Features
★ 1925 hand-crafted Puzzles
★ 3 game modes (Easy, Hard and Relax)
★ Clean and Minimalist Design
★ Hints available to help solve puzzles
★ Optimized for human brains

Enjoy the Experience!
